title: Pinch to Zoom not working + Touch screen insensitivity for Pixel 4A. Anyone experiencing this?
content:
Pinch to Zoom doesn't work at all. 
Keypad sensitivity is quite off, which means the touch screen is not tracking my movement well.
Was using a screen protector, so I took that off to see if it's the problem, but the issues still persist. Only using my 4A for less than 6 months.
